languages.text: "Хочу отдать должное вашей предприимчивости. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Хлопнуть Владайма{/d} в момент его триумфа — это вы ловко придумали. Думаю, он даже оценил бы поэтичность момента, если бы не кружил сейчас без башки по орбите с такими же неудачниками".

traits.locale_text: "Хочу отдать должное вашей предприимчивости. Хлопнуть Владайма в момент его величайшего триумфа — это вы ловко придумали. Думаю, он даже оценил бы поэтичность момента, если бы не кружил сейчас без башки по орбите с такими же неудачниками". {n}Ризза хрипло смеется.{/n}

languages.text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Smacking Vladaym down{/d} in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."
languages.original_text: "Хочу отдать должное вашей предприимчивости. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Хлопнуть Владайма{/d} в момент его триумфа — это вы ловко придумали. Думаю, он даже оценил бы поэтичность момента, если бы не кружил сейчас без башки по орбите с такими же неудачниками".

traits.locale_text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. Smacking Vladaym down in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

"I want to congratulate you on your initiative. Smacking Vladaym down in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

"I want to congratulate you on your initiative. Smacking Vladaym down in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

"I want to congratulate you on your initiative. Smacking Vladaym down in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

languages.text: “我想恭喜你采取了行动，在弗拉迪姆的胜利时刻把他{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}打趴下{/d}了。这个做法真是相当精明。我猜，就算是他，也能看到这其中的诗意。遗憾的是，他现在已经和其他那些耗尽了运气的蠢货一起，飘在轨道上了。”
languages.original_text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Smacking Vladaym down{/d} in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

traits.locale_text: “我想恭喜你采取了行动，在弗拉迪姆的胜利时刻把他打趴下了。这个做法真是相当精明。我猜，就算是他，也能看到这其中的诗意。遗憾的是，他现在已经和其他那些耗尽了运气的蠢货一起，飘在轨道上了。”

languages.text: «Quiero darle la enhorabuena por su iniciativa. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Abatir a Vladaym{/d} en su momento de mayor gloria... menuda jugada. Creo que incluso él apreciaría la justicia poética si no estuviera flotando sin cabeza en órbita con los otros idiotas a los que se les acabó la suerte».
languages.original_text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Smacking Vladaym down{/d} in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero darle la enhorabuena por su iniciativa. Abatir a Vladaym en su momento de mayor gloria... menuda jugada. Creo que incluso él apreciaría la justicia poética si no estuviera flotando sin cabeza en órbita con los otros idiotas a los que se les acabó la suerte».

languages.text: 「あんたの先見の明に敬意を表したい。ヴラダイムが勝利を確信した瞬間にあいつを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}打ちのめす{/d}なんて…抜け目のない奴だよ。もしあいつが今、同じく運を使い果たした他のバカどもと一緒に軌道上で死んだまま漂ってなければ、あいつでさえお見事と言っただろう」
languages.original_text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Smacking Vladaym down{/d} in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたの先見の明に敬意を表したい。ヴラダイムが勝利を確信した瞬間にあいつを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}打ちのめす{/d}なんて…抜け目のない奴だよ。もしあいつが今、同じく運を使い果たした他のバカどもと一緒に軌道上で死んだまま漂ってなければ、あいつでさえお見事と言っただろう」

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euch zu Eurer Initiative beglückwünschen. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Vladaym im Augenblick seines Triumphs zu stürzen{/d} – das war ein kluger Zug. Ich bin sicher, selbst er würde darin poetische Gerechtigkeit erkennen, triebe er nicht gerade kopflos im Orbit, zusammen mit den ganzen anderen Narren, deren Glückssträhne ein jähes Ende fand."
languages.original_text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Smacking Vladaym down{/d} in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte Euch zu Eurer Initiative beglückwünschen. Vladaym im Augenblick seines Triumphs zu stürzen – das war ein kluger Zug. Ich bin sicher, selbst er würde darin poetische Gerechtigkeit erkennen, triebe er nicht gerade kopflos im Orbit, zusammen mit den ganzen anderen Narren, deren Glückssträhne ein jähes Ende fand."

languages.text: « Je tiens à vous féliciter pour votre initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Mettre une gifle pareille à Vladaym{/d}, et juste pendant son heure de gloire... C'était malin. Je crois que même lui apprécierait ce genre de justice poétique, s'il avait encore toute sa tête et qu'il était pas occupé à flotter en orbite, avec tous les autres imbéciles dont la chance a tourné. »
languages.original_text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Smacking Vladaym down{/d} in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

traits.locale_text: « Je tiens à vous féliciter pour votre initiative. Mettre une gifle pareille à Vladaym, et juste pendant son heure de gloire... C'était malin. Je crois que même lui apprécierait ce genre de justice poétique, s'il avait encore toute sa tête et qu'il était pas occupé à flotter en orbite, avec tous les autres imbéciles dont la chance a tourné. »

languages.text: "İnisiyatifini de tebrik etmek isterim. Tam zafer anında {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Vladaym'ı hezimete uğratmak{/d}, çok kurnazca bir hamleydi. Bahtsız diğer tüm salaklarla birlikte kellesinden ayrı bir şekilde yörüngede süzülüyor olmasaydı bence o da bunun aslında ilahi adalet olduğunu anlardı."
languages.original_text: "I want to congratulate you on your initiative. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}Smacking Vladaym down{/d} in the moment of his triumph — that was a shrewd move. I think even he would see the poetic justice of it, if he wasn't currently floating headless in orbit with all the other fools whose luck ran out."

traits.locale_text: "İnisiyatifini de tebrik etmek isterim. Tam zafer anında Vladaym'ı hezimete uğratmak, çok kurnazca bir hamle oldu. Bahtsız diğer tüm salaklarla birlikte kellesinden ayrı bir şekilde yörüngede süzülüyor olmasaydı, bence o da bunun aslında ilahi adalet olduğunu anlardı."
